snippet: Joss Whedon talks about difficulties he's faced on projects like "Firefly," "Dollhouse" and "The Cabin in the Woods," and what he plans to do after "The Avengers."
abstract: Joss Whedon talks about difficulties he's faced on projects like "Firefly," "Dollhouse" and "The Cabin in the Woods," and what he plans to do after "The Avengers."

headline.main: 'Avengers' Director Joss Whedon on His Creative Setbacks
